title: The Old Willis Place

Only by connecting with the new girl who moves into the old Willis place can Diana and little brother George be freeâ€”but making contact with this girl would be a violation of the rules. The pursuit of friendship is at the heart of this haunting novel, and brilliant plot twists make The Old Willis Place an irresistible page turner.
